title: Integrated Dental Clinical Reasoning Development: Case-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dental knowledge (oral anatomy, pathology, etc.) and fundamental understanding of clinical procedures
context.additional_context: Conducted in a virtual patient simulation environment using VR equipment, with access and analysis of case materials via individual mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can perform the process of patient information collection → diagnosis → treatment planning with 80% accuracy across three or more complex clinical cases.
Learners can achieve decision-making accuracy 1.5 times higher than treatment planning during diagnostic decisions.
Learners can identify and improve three or more clinical errors through peer and self-assessment in VR simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
